<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Hobgoblin General](/Monsters.aspx?ID=263)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Hobgoblin generals serve as leaders of entire armies and rulers of hobgoblin settlements. A general does not permit the luxuries of rule to soften them. They lead their forces on the field of battle and view this opportunity to excel in a fight at the head of an army as the true reward for a life spent honing one’s skills in battle.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Hobgoblin_HobgoblinGeneral.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Hobgoblin General](/Monsters.aspx?ID=263)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 207</row>

**Perception** +13; darkvision

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +12, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +15, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +14, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +2
</row>

**General’s Cry** When a hobgoblin general rolls initiative, as long as they can perceive at least one foe, they can yell a mighty battle cry. The hobgoblin general attempts an Intimidate check to Demoralize a single foe within 60 feet as a free action. If successful, any ally with the goblin trait can, as its first action on its first turn of the combat, Stride up to double its speed as a single action.

**Items**
[Half Plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=12), [Composite Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75) (20 arrows), [_+1 glaive_](/Weapons.aspx?ID=20)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 90

**Formation** When it’s adjacent to at least two other allies, the hobgoblin general gains a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws. This bonus increases to +2 to Reflex saves against area effects.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_glaive_ +17 ([deadly 1d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d8+10 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
composite shortbow +15 ([Brutal](/Traits.aspx?ID=249), [deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+8 piercing

**Polearm Critical Specialization**   On a critical hit, the target of the critical hit is moved 5 feet in a direction of the hobgoblin general’s choice.

</column>
